pullrequest.title: Find CURL using standard CMake find_package

content.raw:
This is useful to find CURL on platforms without pkg-config, as Windows/vcpkg . 
The use of pkg-config variables has not been completely removed because they are used in the VS2013/`configure.bat` based build, see the inline todo.
content.html: This is useful to find CURL on platforms without pkg-config, as Windows/vcpkg . The use of pkg-config variables has not been completely removed because they are used in the VS2013/configure.bat based build, see the inline todo.
